alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Orleans; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Orleans and northeastern Franklin Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enosburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Enosburg Falls, Derby Center, Charleston, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Westfield, Newport Center, Berkshire, North Troy Village, Montgomery Center, Richford, Derby, Montgomery, Coventry, Enosburg Falls Village, Troy, Enosburg and Derby Center Village. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 164 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern and northwestern Vermont.
